docs.text: Analytics tasks About The project includes 3 main modules. fs [File search]: To index file text in a flexible way. vl [Visual library]: A reference point for charts and graphs. ao [Automate office]: Automation that prepares powerpoint slides using excel .vba, R and python. Objective(s) Text mining. Build PowerPoint presentaitons at scale. Build visualizations with least time and effort.
